Package abce.agency.async

Interface Summary
AsyncUpdate When agents update data upon which other agents will take action, syncronously updating these values at decision time potentially creates race conditions.
 

Class Summary
CloneHelper Static factory methods to clone objects which we cannot extend to implement AsyncUpdate.
Temporal<T> The Temporal class was designed to hold a current and future state of any class used by Simternet.
TemporalArrayList<E>  
TemporalBitMap2D  
TemporalBitSet  
TemporalHashMap<K,V> TemporalHashMaps defer changes made to a map until after the object's update method is called.
TemporalHashSet<E>  
TemporalObjectGrid2D Temporal version of Mason's ObjectGrid2D.
TemporalSparseGrid2D As with TemporalHashMap, changes are intercepted and deferred until update() is called, at which time they are committed to the underlying SparseGrid2D.
